item.title: First Project Post using md
item.description: Just a bunch of words, qwertyuiodjlhuslhulc luhidh can I add R code in md file? Yes, but it is not executable plot(1:10, 41:50) Does Math expression work? $$\beta = \alpha$$ How about some alert? Do not get serious with arrange()
